body_html:
Good write-up.

It suggests that people in the field might have a slightly rigid way of thinking about these things

This is probably due to the empirical basis of many findings. We can also question why we are using MaxPooling at all? I have recently seen many nets where MaxPooling is substituted just by an extra convolutional stride, without significant loss of performance (if any).
